ygData.subject: Re: Battle at the Cybertronian Fire
ygData.msgSnippet: ... No need to forward me any messages, FZ says over a general signal through the comm as he overhears Iron Raptor s transmission to Dark One, I m right

::FZ::

"No need to forward me any messages," FZ says over a general signal 
through the comm as he overhears Iron Raptor's transmission to Dark 
One, "I'm right here and heading for your location. We can talk 
there."

He spins and powers his jetpack, flying toward Iron Raptor at top 
speed, keeping track of Angel Prime behind him. He lands near the 
Maximal commander.

"I gather you wish to end this battle?"



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> 
> 
> * Iron Raptor suddenly growled as she recieved Dark Ones 
transmission, 
> sighing and seeing that Demon Wulf wasn't coming, giving her a 
slight moment 
> to relax the grip on her sword.
> He was giving her a chance to get Chordate back without having to 
give up 
> anything major. Releasing a few captives would be alright...but she 
knew 
> from experience that the Maximals were hard to stop once the rage 
of battle 
> took them.
> She sighed and straightened herself out, opening her comm-link.*
> 
> " Dark One...I have to say that...the proposition is 
very...tempting."
> 
> * She was out of breath and tired, sweating in her suit.
> Iron Raptor swollowed and lowered her helm, looking out over the 
field as 
> the battle continued.*
> 
> " But I need to meet face to face with Zardus about this...while we 
BOTH 
> give the word to stop the fighting. You know my location, tell him, 
I'll be 
> waiting."
> 
> * She then shut off the transmission to Dark One and opened one to 
all 
> Maximal codes, wondering if they were going to listen to her or 
will it be a 
> reapeat of that one time when she had to shout to Oblitertron to 
shoot at 
> her instead.
> It had to be worth the risk.*
> 
> " Maximals!! Chordat's being held by the Alliance and they've said 
that they 
> would release him if we relaeased their troops that are in our ship 
and let 
> them leave without firing on them.
> I want you ALL to cease fire on any enemy and converge on my 
position, if we 
> want our Maximal back alive you'll do this for him. I don't want 
his life 
> hanging on your shoulders just because a few of us might be trigger 
happy."
> 
> * She kept her comm open as she waited, to all codes. Both Maximal 
and 
> enemy, hoping that the Maximals would listen, and if they didn't 
then she 
> would have to do something about it.
> Iron Raptor looked at her sword, a light show might do, but not to 
hurt 
> anyone, just to get them shocked into listening, if it became that 
bad.
> Maybe another stream of light except into the cloude, create some 
thunder.
> Just something.
> But she hoped that she wouldn't have to drain her energy to go 
that.*
> 
> 
>
